The claim made by Ken Paxton: the Texas attorney general, stating that President Obama used an order to "unilaterally confer" citizenship on immigrants.
The statement from the June 2012 Homelan: which explicitly stated that it confers no substantive right, immigration status, or pathway to citizenship.
The figures released by U: S. Citizenship and Immigration Services indicating that 39,514 DACA recipients have been approved for Lawful Permanent Resident status, implying that they could later seek citizenship.
The press release from Senator Chuck Gra: which publicized USCIS figures and stated that thousands of DACA recipients exploited an immigration law loophole to obtain green cards, with over a thousand already obtaining citizenship.
